lines.text:
[after dismissing Harlow while on the phone wuth the casting director]
Next time gimme a girl who isn't ashamed of her body.

[Crying after a bad day at the studio]
Oh, Mom, all they want is my body!

[to Jean]
You have the body of a woman and the emotions of a child!
Perhaps your agent could find a good part for me.
A bedroom with only one person in it is the loneliest room in the world.
The time has come for us to start making sex films for the family.

[after Paul's death]
Don't say things about the dead
There's nobodydeader than i am right now. Oh, I guarantt all of you I won't be by tomorrow.

[Last lines]
She's beyond help, Mrs. Bello.
Pneumonia is somethig we haven't conquered.
She dudn't die of pneumonia. She died of life. She gave it all to everyone else, and there wasn't enough left for her.

[to Jean]
Try to stay the same unspoiled movie star you always were.
